channel.title: Crash at Ventilator/hl2.exe quit working
channel.description: First I can not express how great this mod is and how excited I am to play it! Thanks Devs for doing all this as a labor of love! <3 Now, I do get a crash everytime the ventilator starts up. I always get hl2.exe quit working/not working properly. ANY help would be greatly appreciated!! I really want to keep playing! 4 GB RAM Intel dual 180ghz Vista 32bit crash reports attached as well... hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_4T10_19_1C0.mdmp (78.2 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_4T10_23_12C0.mdmp (77.5 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_4T10_24_27C0.mdmp (79.7 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_4T10_36_26C0.mdmp (77.5 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_5T1_30_31C0.mdmp (77.5 KB)

item.title: Crash at Ventilator/hl2.exe quit working
item.dc:creator: DogsRevenge
item.description:
Yup just searched and did just that, smashed or threw all the boxes, palettes, and the 2 tanks into the abyss. It worked! Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at Ventilator/hl2.exe quit working
item.dc:creator: mshee32
item.description:
Others have stated that it’s probably a physics glitch and some have reported that smashing all of the boxes and/or throwing all of them and the barrels down past the fan into the abyss has prevented the game from crashing. You could always try getting out of that area as quickly as possible, and making for the next loading screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at Ventilator/hl2.exe quit working
item.dc:creator: DogsRevenge
item.description:
First I can not express how great this mod is and how excited I am to play it! Thanks Devs for doing all this as a labor of love! <3

Now, I do get a crash everytime the ventilator starts up. I always get hl2.exe quit working/not working properly. ANY help would be greatly appreciated!! I really want to keep playing!

4 GB RAM
Intel dual 180ghz
Vista 32bit

crash reports attached as well…
